Name: Borax Na_2B_4O_5(OH)_4.8H_2O
Type: Mineral
Class: Borates
Subclass: 
Particle Size: 125-500um
Sample No.: B-6A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: USA, California, Kern County, Boron
Collected by Burminco
Description: 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: b06aa.txt
